Sentencas: A numerical model has been developed to simulate the effect of combustion zone geometry on the steady state and transient performance of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: A mathematical model of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell with specified combustion zone

Sentencas: The model consists of an electrochemical submodel and a thermal submodel.
Titulo: A mathematical model of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell with specified combustion zone

Sentencas: In the electrochemical model, a network circuit of a tubular SOFC was adopted to model the dynamics of Nernst potential, ohmic polarization, activation polarization, and concentration polarization.
Titulo: A mathematical model of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell with specified combustion zone

Sentencas: The thermal submodel simulated heat transfers by conduction, convention, and radiation between the cell and the air feed tube.
Titulo: A mathematical model of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell with specified combustion zone

Sentencas: The developed model was applied to simulate the performance of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell at various operating parameters, including distributions of circuits, temperature, and gas concentrations inside the fuel cell.
Titulo: A mathematical model of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell with specified combustion zone

Sentencas: The simulations predicted that increasing the length of the combustion zone would lead to an increase of the overall cell tube temperature and a shorter response time for transient performance.
Titulo: A mathematical model of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell with specified combustion zone

Sentencas: Enlarging the combustion zone, however, makes only a negligible contribution to electricity output properties, such as output voltage and power.
Titulo: A mathematical model of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell with specified combustion zone

Sentencas: These numerical results show that the developed model can reasonably simulate the performance properties of a tubular SOFC and is applicable to cell stack design.
Titulo: A mathematical model of a tubular solid oxide fuel cell with specified combustion zone
